text.section: It is a mutual holding company organized under sections 19F to 19W, inclusive.

One purpose of such mutual holding company is to own, directly or through one or more intermediate stock holding companies, not less than 51 per cent of the voting stock of one or more reorganized insurers.
It is not authorized to issue voting stock.
Its members have the rights specified in subsections (a) to (n), inclusive, of section 19K and in its articles of organization and by-laws.

Its assets and liabilities are, to the extent provided in sections 19F to 19W, inclusive, subject to inclusion in the estate of the reorganized insurer in any proceedings successfully prosecuted against the reorganized insurer under section 6 or sections 180A to 180L, inclusive.
